transArray.content: After getting off the subway line 6, there is a hotel opposite. It is very convenient to park in the park. The room is really clean and well-equipped. The waiters are very enthusiastic. The most recommended thing is their breakfast, which is open until 11 o'clock and there are many kinds! ! It is recommended to stay here when you are away from home!

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition of the hotel's environment and services. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the Fourth Ring Road. It shares parking spaces with the park. There are sufficient parking spaces and is close to You can park for free by simply picking up an electronic parking coupon at the front desk when you are in the store. Public transportation is easily accessible around the hotel, making it your best choice for business trips and accommodation. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast has a variety of varieties, is nutritious and delicious, freshly cooked noodles, hot soup noodles and small pastries to satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home. The hotel's attentive service, a cup Hot tea will make you feel at home. The room you are staying in has a cleaning lady who is most worthy of your trust and provides attentive butler-like service. We look forward to your visit. General Manager: Li Changxia
